item.description:
Jim & I (Paul) leave for our 10 day trip to North Carolina on July 10th.

Come and escort us over the state line and then lets cruise the Taconic Parkway in New York state together, Hudson river valley is beautiful this time of year.

We will be splitting off and hitting the slab on our way to NJ, but will enjoy a good 45+ miles on the Taconic State Parkway taking in the green, the fresh air, taking photos and pit stopping for lunch before y'all turn Northeast toward Boston on equally nice roads that will take you back up through CT to meetup with the Pike. See the MAP

We will be departing from Westborough Plaza on the Pike at 9AM and plan to cross the state line before noon, we will be stopping at each of the service plaza's briefly to add riders. Westborough Plaza is just past 495 on the Pike - If you will be joining us, RSVP here and call me that morning with your ETA 617-544-SHOE

Westborough Plaza to Exit 1 on the Pike is 104 Miles or 2 hours in the saddle, then it's dreamy tarcake and beautiful vistas for as far as you dare ride astray.

Hope we get great weather and you can join us for this send off!

Paul & Jim
item.name: Escort us over the line!
